za.ac.wits.elen4010.fluidsim.gui

Class FileWriter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • za.ac.wits.elen4010.fluidsim.gui.FileWriter<T>

  • public class FileWriter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for accepting objects and printing them to the output file specified. In the GUI it handles writing of type SimulationInput and writing th- em to the specified file
    See Also:
    SimulationInput

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.io.ObjectOutputStream outFile
      Stores the object stream used for output
      private java.lang.String outFilePath
      Stores the name of the file to be written to

      Creates a new FileWriter, bound to the given file path

      Returns the path to the file currently loaded by the file reader

      Allows for the file to be closed and then opened again under a different name/path

      Accepts an object and writes it to the end of the outFile stream
